verbs.description: [ARG0: European Union leaders] [V: presented] [ARG1: a determined front to stand up to U.S. President Donald Trump ’s threats to penalize EU businesses and scupper the Iran nuclear deal] .
European Union leaders presented a determined front to [V: stand] up [ARG2: to U.S. President Donald Trump ’s threats to penalize EU businesses and scupper the Iran nuclear deal] .
European Union leaders presented a determined front to stand up to [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump ’s] threats to [V: penalize] [ARG1: EU businesses] and scupper the Iran nuclear deal .
European Union leaders presented a determined front to stand up to [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump ’s] threats to penalize EU businesses and [V: scupper] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear deal] .
